Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Fulton
ShortDescription: Update: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Washington, Laramie, Chicago, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Washington, Laramie, Chicago, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Fulton.

Allow extra travel time.
